long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool helps you download your Flight Scope Session data to an Excel spreadsheet with the option to add a customized overview sheet to more quickly get a high level understanding of how you performed with each club while being able to focus on the metrics that are most important to you.
